量.definition: capacity; quantity; amount; to estimate; abbr. for 量詞|量词[liang4 ci2], classifier (in Chinese grammar); measure word

量入為出.definition: to assess one's income and spend accordingly (idiom); to live within one's means; You can only spend what you earn.

量力而為.definition: to weigh one's abilities and act accordingly; to act according to one's means; to cut one's coat according to one's cloth

量力而行.definition: to assess one's capabilities and act accordingly (idiom); to act within one's competence; One does what one can.

量化.definition: to quantify; quantification; quantitative; to quantize; quantization

量子沫.definition: quantum foam (in string theory, and science fiction)

量子色動力學.pinyin: liàng zǐ sè dòng lì xué

量子電動力學.pinyin: liàng zǐ diàn dòng lì xué

量才錄用.definition: to assess sb's capabilities and employ him accordingly (idiom); to employ sb competent for the task

量級.definition: order of magnitude; weight class (boxing etc); (fig.) class (level of capability)

量腹.definition: to estimate how much food is required for a meal

量規.definition: gauge that is held against an object to judge thickness, diameter etc, such as a feeler gauge, calipers etc; (abbr. for 評價量規|评价量规[ping2 jia4 liang2 gui1]) rubric (i.e. a guide listing specific criteria for grading)

量販.definition: to sell in a large amount at a lower price per unit

量身.definition: to take sb's measurements; to measure sb up

量身定做.definition: to tailor-make; tailor-made; tailored to; customized

量體裁衣.definition: lit. to cut cloth according to the body (idiom); fig. to act according to actual circumstances

量體重.definition: to weigh oneself; to measure sb's weight
